page.title: 12CELEBRATING CHRISTMAS.
page.content: In our house Christmas is a very lively celebration. We have a big fir tree from the forest and we always decorate it with the same decorations: tinsel, baubles, brightly coloured lights which inevitably malfunction, and the fairy on the top. Before we go to bed on Christmas Eve we put out a glass of sherry for Father Christmas and a dish of milk for his reindeer. We also hang up a stocking for our presents. We usually have a traditional routine for opening the presents on Christmas morning. Sometimes they are hidden: last year my new bike was in the toilet! The Christmas dinner is another tradition, with roast turkey, potatoes and vegetables, followed by Christmas pudding with lashings of cream.
